description: This portfolio page is a modern, fully responsive single-page application (SPA) developed primarily using vanilla JavaScript and CSS.
It combines a clean structure with bilingual support (German & English), dynamic theme switching (light/dark), and a modular architecture designed for long-term scalability.

Custom-built UI components such as the navigation bar, sidebar, toast notifications, and breadcrumbs are complemented by features like an icon carousel, a comprehensive privacy policy, an integrated chatbot, and Google Analytics visualization via Chart.js.

features.title: Mostly Vanilla
desc: Both CSS and JavaScript are largely written in plain vanilla code.
Bootstrap is used only for spacing, dropdowns (tooltips are vanilla), and image carousels.
Alpine.js manages all interactive logic and data access within specific contexts.

features.title: Themes
desc: The portfolio page supports both light and dark themes.
Themes are implemented entirely using CSS variables.

features.title: Responsive
desc: The site is fully responsive.
It is based on a flexible 12-column grid layout.

features.title: Modular
desc: The modular structure allows for easy integration of future features.
The directory layout is clean and easy to maintain.

features.title: SPA
desc: The site is implemented as a Single Page Application (SPA).
Navigation uses hash routing with 404 redirect handling.
The History API enables seamless navigation.
Content is loaded using the Fetch API with lazy-loading support.

features.title: Bilingual Support (German & English)
desc: The page supports both German and English.
Text content is loaded dynamically based on the selected language.
Language is selected automatically via browser settings but can be changed manually.

features.title: Toast Notifications
desc: Custom toast messages provide system feedback.
They can be pinned, clicked, or removed.
Right-clicking triggers a removal animation.

features.title: Navigation Bar
desc: The navigation bar is fully custom-built.
It includes a burger menu for small screens.

features.title: Breadcrumbs
desc: Breadcrumb navigation is implemented for orientation.
Breadcrumbs are generated dynamically using a universal function.

features.title: Icon Carousel
desc: An auto-rotating carousel displays labeled icons.
The animation remains within the boundaries of the parent element.

features.title: Icon Color & Animation
desc: All icons (except in the carousel) feature animated color transitions on hover.
These animations can be toggled on or off.

features.title: Privacy
desc: A mandatory privacy policy must be accepted or declined.
It explains what data is stored, for what purpose, and how it can be deleted.
The site cannot be used without interacting with the privacy dialog.

features.title: Chatbot
desc: A chatbot based on DeepSeek is integrated.
It uses a public API of a DeepSeek fork.
The service is provided via a custom Cloudflare Worker to protect the API key.
The chatbot frontend was briefly available as a Chrome extension but was removed due to compliance issues.

features.title: Sidebar
desc: A collapsible sidebar facilitates page navigation.

features.title: Google Analytics
desc: The latest version of Google Analytics is integrated.
It tracks the number of visitors and specific test event triggers.
Data is anonymized and stored for one week only.
Visualization is done using Chart.js.
Current API changes may temporarily affect functionality.
